subject: Simsonn HB Pro: Option to buy handle separately
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Support,

I recently purchased the Simsonn HB Pro with a 20 cm handle and wanted 
to ask if it is possible to order the 13 cm handle separately as an 
accessory so that I have both options?

Thank you in advance

Kind regards,

Peter Ehm

conversations.body_text: Hello, you may click this link to make a purchase.
